metadata.feature_description: Load activity stream content in pages with 'Get More' and 'Show All' options

steps.action: Navigate to Community page with Activity Stream
steps.expected: Activity Stream loads with initial set of posts
steps.actual: Activity Stream loaded successfully with 14-16 posts displayed on initial page load

steps.action: Scroll to bottom of the Activity Stream
steps.expected: More posts should be loaded automatically when scrolling reaches the bottom
steps.actual: URL changed to ?lastItem=7 indicating pagination was triggered. The continuous scrolling feature is enabled by default. Posts are loaded automatically when user scrolls.

steps.expected: Additional posts should be displayed or 'Show All' button should appear if no more posts
steps.actual: Post count remained at 14, indicating all available posts have been loaded. No 'Get More' or 'Show All' buttons visible because continuous scrolling is enabled.

steps.action: Check if 'Get More' button exists in DOM
steps.actual: 'Get More' button exists in DOM but is hidden (display: none) because continuous scrolling is enabled. Code confirms: isGetMoreButtonVisible = !isContinuousScrollingEnabled && morePagesToLoad

steps.action: Check if 'Show All' button exists in DOM
steps.actual: 'Show All' button exists in DOM but is hidden (display: none). Code shows it becomes visible when continuous scrolling is enabled AND all pages are loaded AND there are existing posts. Currently all posts are loaded.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify correct number of posts per page

steps.action: Count initial posts loaded on page
steps.expected: Default page size should be 20 posts (configurable in module settings)
steps.actual: 14-16 posts loaded initially. Code confirms default PageSize is 20, but fewer posts were returned because there are only ~14-16 total posts in the system. This is expected behavior - system loaded all available posts which is less than the page size.

steps.action: Select 'Added to Wiki' filter from dropdown
steps.expected: Activity Stream should show only wiki-related posts
steps.actual: Filter successfully applied. Post count reduced from ~16 to 7 posts, showing only wiki article entries

steps.action: Verify filtered posts are displayed correctly
steps.expected: Only wiki-related activity items should be visible
steps.actual: All displayed posts show 'authored wiki article' activity type. Filter working correctly with pagination.

observations: Continuous scrolling is enabled by default in this Activity Stream configuration, which hides the 'Get More' and 'Show All' buttons
The 'Get More' button is only visible when isContinuousScrollingEnabled is false AND there are more pages to load
The 'Show All' button appears when continuous scrolling is enabled AND all pages have been loaded
Default page size is 20 posts (configured in Settings.ascx), but actual posts displayed depends on available content
URL parameter ?lastItem=N is used to track pagination state during continuous scrolling
Activity Stream filter dropdown works correctly and maintains pagination behavior with filtered results
